inn1.comm: fuller ball, drifting in, Tamim drives to short cover
fuller ball, drifting in, inside-edges it to the pads
comes forward and defends into the off side
flatter delivery, whips it through midwicket

pushed in from outside off, not much turn, so the ball takes the outside edge as the batsman comes forward and pushes, goes safely past the slip fielder. Some bounce there as well, so he wasn't entirely comfortable playing that
bowled into the pads, tucked around the corner
bit of inswing into the left-hander, shuffles across and flicks but gets it off the inside edge to midwicket
full and pushed across, holds its line outside off, stabs it into the off side from the crease
good length, pushed across quicket but straightens late, jams it back to the bowler
full and on the pads, rolls his wrists on the flick but picks the fielder at midwicket
drags his length back and pushes it through outside off, Tamim comfortably gets on top of it and rides the bounce as he defends it to the off side
full toss fired outside off, tentatively pushes at it and makes no contact, the ball dips as it goes through to the wicketkeeper
pushed to covers
edged but falls short of slip. Slower through the air and straightens sharply after pitching on the pads, gets a healthy edge but it falls short of first slip
straighter ball on off, doesn't turn much, defended to the off side
slightly short on leg stump, tucks it to midwicket off the backfoot
pitched up and slight turn there, loopy delivery, Tamim presses forward and defends it into the off side
comes down the track but doesn't get to the pitch of the ball, inside-edges it to the pads
length ball, moves back in late, tucks it behind square on the leg side off the pads
comes forward and nudges this to the covers region

short of a length ball, pitched on leg stump channel, it's a harmless delivery and easy pickings for Tamim who tucks it off the hips to the deep midwicket fence. That length isn't going to help him find swing
back of a length ball that pitches on middle and is angled away, Tamim plants his front foot way across and tries to nudge it to the leg side but wears it on the pads. Appeal for lbw but it's high
pitched up ball but fires it on leg stump, Tamim tries to clip it off the toes but the ball kisses the pad and runs down to the fine leg boundary
back of a length ball, angled across, drags it from outside off to the man at midwicket. No run there
floated up on the stumps, presses forward and defends solidly back to the bowler
comes down the track but gets way too forward and is only able to squeeze it out to midwicket
comes forward and looks to block but it's drifting away and gets the outside edge that goes past the slip fielder
fuller and on the pads, pushed through quicker as he tries to rush the batsman, but he clips it away off the toes
flighted and on a length, doesn't get as much turn as he would have hoped, blocked on the front foot
fuller and angling away, tempting the batsman to drive. Sarkar pushes it on the front foot but the ball goes off the inside half of the bat back to the bowler
short of a length ball, pushes him back, gets on top of it and defends it solidly back to the bowler
poor delivery, short and enough time for the batsman to get in position. Sarkar pulls and the ball races towards the deep square leg fence before a diving save is made
full and induces the drive, but the batsman gets it off the inside edge and the ball rolls back to the bowler
slower ball that is pitched up outside off, waits for it before opening the face of his bat and steering it to third man
yorker outside off, kept out to mid-on
starts off with a back of a length ball outside off, Sarkar mistimes the punch to covers
fuller ball on leg and middle, dabs it in front of midwicket and scampers across for a quick single

comes down the track and makes room, the bowler makes the adjustment and fires it wide outside off, Tamim can't get his slap off the middle of the bat and it is fielded in the covers region, gets just one for his troubles
ill-advised slog across the line, it was full and wide but Tamim's slog goes off the leading edge uppishly and lands just after the fielder at cover
makes up for the earlier lapse with a lovely shot played with a straight bat. Similar delivery that is full and outside off, Tamim plants his front foot and punches it firmly for a straight bounary
looks to flick and misses, hit on the pad. Pitched outside leg, so not given
fuller ball, almost hits the blockhole outside off, movement into the left-handed batsman, who jams his bat down but skews it towards mid-on
drags his length back and Sarkar pulls it to deep square leg, doesn't middle it again
presses forward and stabs this fuller delivery with the angle to covers
short and wide, Tamim is ready for it and backs away slightly to give himself enough room, slaps it through the covers, it's quite packed there but he manages to pierce the gap
fires it down the leg side and called a wide
shorter ball, it's wide and moving away slightly late, slashes hard at it but is beaten
fuller ball, looks to drive but the ball goes off the inside part of his bat ack towards the bowler
drags his length back, goes for an almighty pull but the bounce isn't there as much. The ball goes from underneath his bat to the wicketkeeper who is standing up
fires it full and on the pads, clipped away to the deep midwicket fence
good length ball, pushed across and holding its line outside off, gets across and taps it to covers
yorker on the leg and middle channel, kept out
full and on the toes, gets it away to mid-on who lets the ball go through his legs
played wide of mid-on for a quick single
drifting down leg, the ball goes off the pad to the corner behind square
full and angling away, left alone outside off
fuller ball outside off, looks to drive but closes the face of his bat and gets it straight to mid-on
fuller ball, width on offer, driven through mid-off for a lovely boundary
drops it short and Sarkar defends
length ball outside off, gets forward and defends it to covers
pre-meditated. Got on to the front foot early but the ball bounces a tad more than he anticipated after landing on a length on leg stump channel, checks the shot to point
fuller ball outside leg, clipped off the toes past short midwicket
loose shot and pays the price. It was a shortish ball that was angling away and Tamim wildly swings as he looks to slog it across the line. Gets a healthy outside edge and third man snaffles it
good length ball, angling in on the stumps, defends it quietly back to the bowler
sticks his bat out to a length ball outside off as he looks to defend on the front foot but the ball runs away to the leg side after taking the inside edge
good length ball, defended from outside off back to the bowler
fuller ball outside off, driven to mid-off
beaten! Good length ball, tempts the batsman to stick his bat out by bowling it on the fourth stump channel, tentatively played by the batsman and the ball shoots narrowly past the outside edge
good length ball on the stumps, defended
back of a length, angling in from outside off, stands tall and blocks off the backfoot to covers
pushes it fuller and width on offer, gets neatly forward and caresses a drive through covers. Lovely shot

another loose shot and another wicket. Comes down the track and the bowler makes the late adjustment by pulling his length back significantly. Sarkar is forced to drag the slog from outside off and is in no control of the shot whatsoever. Has to fetch it from way outside off and loses balance slightly as he does so. Gets a leading edge that is taken at covers. That looked very ugly
width on offer, tries to slap through the off side but it isn't short enough and doesn't bounce as much, beaten
shoulders arms to a wide delivery but the wicketkeeper fails to collect cleanly allowing a run to be taken
full and wide, gets a lovely stride across and creams a drive through covers. Had to reach out for it but gets it bang off the middle of the bat. Neat execution
fuller ball, stays in the crease and defends but gets an inside edge to the pads. Momentarily thinks of a quick single but two men charge in to gather the ball and they decide against it
waits for it by staying rooted to his crease before defending it to extra cover
fires a tempter outside off, left alone
driven through covers. Pitches it up and gives enough width for Rahim to open up and cream it. It's quite packed there in the covers region but he gets the placement perfectly
comes slightly down the track and gets to the pitch of the ball before pushing it to mid-off
full and wide, thinks of a single after pushing it gently on the front foot but can't get it past mid-off
angled in to the pads, clipped off the pads with the angle to the deep midwicket fence
bowls a similar delivery and Rahim comfortably tucks it away through the same region. But there protection in the deep this time and it is cut off well before the boundary
short ball, bowls it outside off and turns away sharply, called a wide
floats it up outside off, driven to long-off
gets it to drift in slightly as he flights it, lands on middle stumps, pushed back to the bowler
looks to push through the off side and the ball goes off the inside part of his bat back to the bowler
gets forward to defend but gets an outside edge and the ball goes to the cover point region
no turn, goes straight on at the fourth stump line, driven back to the bowler
dabs it to midwicket
slightly short of a length, Rahim backs away and looks to cut but point makes a good stop
short of a length outside off, defended off the backfoot to the off side. No run there
very full and very wide, Mushfiqur slahses hard at it and gets it right off the middle of the bat. Superb square drive and the ball races past the diving point fielder
good length ball, drifting in, gets his foot across and wears it on the pad before the ball runs away towards the fine third man area. Appeal for lbw but the impact was clearly outside off
gets on to the front foot and blocks into the off side
fuller on the fourth or fifth stump channel, blocked to the off side on the front foot
tossed up full on the middle stump, calmly bunted down the ground to long-on
pushed through on the off stump, blocked to midwicket on the front foot
slower legbreak outside off, open-faced sliced drive through point
legbreak outside off, enough turn to beat the outside edge

outside edge found, but dies a few centimetres in front of slip. Slides on outside off, no turn. He plays for it, wafts and edges it. Luckily for Mahmudullah the nick does not carry. Rashid posing some problems to the hosts
tapped through the cover-point region for a single
no-ball, oversteps, lobbed up wide outside off, eased through the covers on the front foot
lovely legbreak, pitches on off and turns away past the roundhouse swipe of Mahmudullah
floated up outside off, no turn, forward and driven smoothly to long-off
slower legbreak outside off, Mushfiq presses forward, meets the pitch, and pushes the ball square through the off side
length-ball legbreak, defended to cover on the front foot
lobbed up full and outside off, forward and sliced to extra cover
lands this on a good length on off and finds substantial turn, which sees the ball jump past the outside edge. Probing over
slides on, travels along a straight line on off, Mushfiq camps back and blocks it
skids on outside off, Mushfiq pre-meditates, goes low, and slog-sweeps it across the line to cow corner
looks like a googly, comes into the right-hander, who shuffles across and blocks to the leg side
pulls his length back, legbreak outside off, directed through point
rolls on outside off, no turn, Mahmudullah presses forward and steers it through cover for one

Mushfiq pre-meditates again, nimbly drops to one knee, takes this full-length googly from the off stump and paddles it fine through the leg side. Nabi, from slip, comes second in the race. Mushfiq showing positive intent, his fourth four of the innings
tossed on the off stump, dabbed to cover on the front foot
pitched up on off, blocked on the front foot again
dropped short on the middle stump, scoring opportunity, but the batsman misses out. Plays a weak pull and finds short fine leg
straight delivery on middle, fuller length, pushed down the ground, to long-on
Mushfiq shimmies out and drives it back at the bowler, who makes a half-save
Mushfiq steps out again, Rahmat held this back. Mushfiq isn't quite close to the pitch. Eventually, he quietly defends it
speared on off stump, tickled behind square
Mahmudullah now unfurls a fine sweep. Goes low, this slides on off, and places it fine through the leg side, Nabi from slip can't hunt it down again
tossed-up legbreak outside off, slices a drive through extra cover
drops the wrong'un short and gifts width as well, Mushfiq has ample time to lean back and square-cut it away
another legbreak outside off, pitches on the off stump and fizzes past the outside edge
flatter and faster on off, Mushfiq dares to hit against the turn. He slog-sweeps and sends a top-edge over the midwicket region. There is protection in the deep
lobbed up on off, liberal flight, drifts in, inside-edged onto the surface
good-length offbreak, worked to short midwicket
skids on outside off with extra bounce, beats Mushfiq's cut
similar ball, similar shot, plays for the turn and is beaten lavishly again
slower through the air, opens the face and dabs from off stump through point
Mahmudullah skips out but the ball dips, creating distance between the bat and pitch. Skewed off an inside edge square through the leg side
skids on a back of a length, punched down the ground
low full toss on off, stretches forward and slogs to deep midwicket
another flighted full-toss on middle, hacked to deep midwicket off the inside half
flighted on middle, Mushfiq races down the pitch and drives it inside-out to long-off. Backed away and manufactured some swinging room
good length on middle, tapped down the ground, towards long-off
tossed up liberally outside off, driven to long-off
skids on short, rocks back and pulls between deep square leg and deep midwicket
angled from outside off to third man
slower through the air outside off, dips, he closes the bat-face and gets a leading edge towards short third man
wafted down to third man
full on off, forward and across and flicked to midwicket
length and shoots low outside off from over the wicket, dips under the attempted cut
short and outside off, gets on top of the bounce, cracking to sweeper cover
Mushfiq steps forward to meet the pitch of this full ball outside off, Driven to extra-cover
possibly a cutter outside, Mushfiq angles his bat out and nicks it, but the ball dies in front of Shahzad. There isn't much pace and bounce on this pitch
dab-and-run single towards cover. Naveen from his followthrough swoops down on the ball and nails a direct hit at the striker's end, but Mahmudullah is in

Chopped on! The middle stump is knocked back as Naveen unleashes an animated fist pump. Back of a length and outside off, Mahmudullah's foot does not meet the pitch. He simply follows the ball with his hands. Aims a punch through the covers and ends up dragging it back onto the stumps. So, Naveen returns and breaks the thriving stand
shorter legbreak outside off, chopped to extra cover
much slower and fuller outside off, defensively dabbed to cover on the front foot
breaking into the thigh, glanced towards short fine leg
sliding across the left-hander, Shakib slashes a cut and may have edged it. Shahzad was probably late on it, the ball bobbling out of the gloves
flicked to midwicket
pushed on the stumps, whipped to long-on
short and aimed at the chest, tucks him up for room, dropped to square leg
shortish and outside off, jabbed through the covers to the sweeper
dug in short on middle, camps back and fends it onto the pitch
short and kicks up outside off, Shakib leaps, gets on top of the bounce and pulls over midwicket
length and outside off, glided down to third man
slower ball, heading down leg, wide
full-toss angling away from Shakib, he punches it down the ground, the man at mid-off ends up diving over the ball. The extra ball hurts Afghanistan

Mirpur has been hushed into silence as Mushfiq holes out to deep square leg. Naveen ran to his right, tumbled, but hung onto the catch. Tossed up outside off. Mushfiq turns to his favourite shot, the sweep, the top edge flies into Naveen's hands
flighted on middle and leg, driven down to long-on
going down the leg side, wide
legbreak outside off, left alone
googly, another leg-side wide
dropped short on off, skips back and mis-times it back to the bowler
chopped from outside off to backward point as this skids on fast
pitched up on the off stump, Sabbir presses forward and drives a single to long-off
tossed full on off stump, patted to the covers
skids on quick outside off, slightly short, skips past the attempted slash of Sabbir
full on middle and leg, ticked away towards square leg with a roll of the wrists
wrong'un, skids back in to beat the inside and strike the thigh, but it appeared to be heading down the leg side
fraction short outside off, keeps low and dips under the cut
ends the over with another wrong'un. The length is short, making things easier for the batsman. Defended back down the pitch
throws this up on middle, Shakib belts this full ball down the ground, to the left of mid-off. Hit that with great authority. This wasn't a half-volley by the way
short and outside off, slides back and crunches a cut to sweeper cover
rolls his wrists and neatly sweeps the ball down to fine leg
leans back and chops this shorter offering through extra cover
rank long-hop, pulled straight to deep square leg
tossed up liberally on middle and leg, Shakib comes forward. Checks his drive and chips it back towards the bowler, who lets it through him
zipping across, close to the off stump, the length is that short as well. He shapes to cut and is beaten
flicked off the pads through backward square leg
Sabbir goes low, Rashid drags his length back. Mis-times a sweep to short fine leg
dabbed on the back foot to the covers as this slid on off
slider on the off stump, kept out
angled into Shakib from round the wicket, played back to Nabi
Dropped by Shahidi at extra cover! Looped outside off, Shakib aims a booming drive, but ends up chipping it in the air. The ball pops in and pops out. Shahidi can't snatch it on the rebound either
skids on middle, defended
down the track and hit back to the bowler
length ball on middle, played back

Nabi has his man now! This was the arm-ball from Nabi, snakes back in. Shakib is neither forward nor back. Rooted to the crease. Nabi beats the inside and pins him bang in front of middle. The finger went up almost instantly
Sabbir's wicket adds to Bangladesh's slide. Googly, comes in, on a length. The batsman did not read it, attempting a pull and missing. Hits him in line with middle. No snick there
thrusts his bat in front of his pad and defends to the leg side
slides on outside off, Mashrafe plays for the turn and is beaten on the outside
wrong'un, fired in and takes the pad, heading down leg
tossed up and rolls outside off, Mashrafe plays for the legbreak and is beaten by a straighter one
Rahid pulls his length back, steered towards point for a scampered single
offbreak, dabbed in front of square leg for one
flighted on off, Mosaddek stretches forward and secures a single to long-on
drifts in on middle and leg, bunted towards square leg
flighted full on off, blocked back to Nabi on the front foot
tossed on off, played back to the bowler

Mashrafe steps out, Nabi held this back in the air outside off. He does not meet the pitch and softly chips a catch into the lap of mid-off. He sought to clear the fielder, but couldn't impart enough strength into the shot. Bangladesh seven down and sinking
slides on flat and outside off, uses the pace and angles it past slip for four
tossed-up legbreak outside off, has Mosaddek poking and edging, only for Shahzad to drop another one. He was late onto it again
good length on middle, blocked back to the bowler
rolls on outside off, guided to backward point
full on off, jabbed to cover on the front foot
lobbed up and drifts in from round the wicket, edged but does not carry to slip
drifts in on a length again, takes the thigh
tossed slow on off, smothered on the front foot
forward and patted to cover-point on the off stump
another one that drifts in the air, blocked on the front foot again
drifts in, fuller in length, snatches the inside edge and wanders away behind square on the leg side
legbreak outside off, appreciable turn, beats the outside edge of the groping bat
slower through the air on off, not much turn here. Defended on the front foot
liberally tossed up outside off, driven to extra-cover
sharp legbreak outside off, Mosaddek plays back as the ball snakes past the outside edge
dropped short on off, goes deep in the crease, pulling to long-on
pushed through on the stumps, swept to deep square leg
drifts in on middle from wide of the crease, poked out on the pitch
good length and holds its line on off, blocked on the front foot
full on off, wafted towards point off the outside edge
arrowed in on the off stump, pushed to extra-cover on the front foot
Nabi drags his length back on off, blocked on the back foot
speared down the leg side, Taijul looks to help it on its way, fine down the leg side. Shahzad tumbles and drops it on the rebound. Not sure if there was a nick there
comes forward and pushes it into the off side
short ball on middle and leg, punched off the backfoot to long-on
tossed up on the stumps, flicked to midwicket
fires it full and wide, Taijul gets a good stride across and lets it go
short ball, looks to back away and cut but it isn't wide enough and the batsman is cramped for room. The bounce gets big on him and he can't put bat to ball
very full ball, tucked off the toes to midwicket
sprays it down the leg side, easy pickings for Mossadek who just has to get bat to ball to trickle it down to fine leg
fires it down leg again, turns it away with the angle to deep square leg
length ball outside off, the batsman jumps back into the crease and defends to the off side
good length outside off, blocked
short of good length ball, punches it off the backfoot through covers
full ball outside off, waits in the crease and plays it to covers
full and on the leg stump channel, clips it away through the vacant deep midwicket region
full and outside off, lashed through the covers
good length ball angled into the right-hander, presses forward and blocks it back to Naveen
shimmies out and pushes this length ball into the covers
back of a length on middle, patted down the ground for one
very full and on the pads, clipped away to deep backward square leg
a tad full and the batsman stays in the crease and blocks, the ball goes off the inside half of the bat back to the bowler
full and outside off, gets his foot across and creams a lovely cover drive. Splits the gap between cover and mid-off perfectly
short ball, down the leg side, Taijul looks to swivel around and pull but can't get bat to ball

appeal for caught behind, not given. It was very full and wide and the batsman chased it. Shahzad collects the ball and goes up immediately. No appeal from the bowler initially, but he goes up after seeing Shahzad appeal. Umpire isn't convinced
good length ball, darts in, left alone
short of a length, angling in from outside off, opens the face of his bat and steers it to third man
given a lot of flight on the stumps, pushes it along towards mid-off before the bowler runs across in his followthrough and fields it
turns it away to the leg side

appeal for leg before and given. Flipper that holds its line after pitching on leg and middle and Taijul doesn't pick it up. Plays for the turn and misses and is rapped on the pads. That would have hit middle stump flush. Bangladesh briefly looked comfortable with the spinners out of the attack, but a wicket falls immediately after their reintroduction

plumb again. Flipper again and the batsman doesn't read it. Only question was whether it pitched outside the leg stump, pitches marginally within and raps the batsman on th pads. No question of whether or not it would have hit the stumps. Rashid on a hat-trick
pitched up ball, Rubel defends
legbreak that turns sharply outside off, Rubel comes forward looking to block but is nowhere near the ball
turns it away to the vacant region on the leg side and gives strike to the No. 11 with five balls remaining
bowls it outside off, Rubel comes forward but isn't anywhere near the ball
tucks it to fine leg and takes off for a very quick single. Throw at the non-striker's end but the batsman makes it. Had to rush though
works it away to mid-off
backs away and slaps it to covers
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
pitched up on middle and leg, tucked away for a quick single
drops it short and Mosaddek waits in the crease before pulling it away between deep midwicket and long-on

comes forward and taps it through covers. The fielder there pulls it back quickly but Mosaddek wants the strike and calls for a quick second. Has to put in the dive and that isn't the best of throws at the striker's end
gets an inside edge and the ball goes behind square
turn, bounce and beats the outside edge of the batsman who puts his bat out without moving his feet
wrong'un to finish the over, tucked away with the spin behind square on the leg side
good length, outside off, nipping in late, swings and misses
full and outside off, runs it down to third man
short of a length, skids through, Rubel is rooted to the crease and slashes but is beaten
short ball, looks to hook but can't get bat to ball
that's a better length. Fires a tempter outside off, Rubel swings hard and can't make contact
very full but not the right line, fires it at the pads and it is easily tucked away to deep midwicket
aims for the blockhole but bowls it on leg stump channel, Rubel squeezes it out to wide long-on
back-of-the-hand slower delivery that is pitched up on the stumps, tucked behind square on the leg side
short ball, Rubel looks to pull but the ball crashes into the helmet grill. Probably got a bit of glove on it before it hit the helmet
full and on the leg stump channel, whipped powerfully straight to the fielder at midwicket
full and wide outside off, tried the slower ball but it moves away late outside the crease
full and outside off, stabs it to the right of the bowler who dives but slightly pushes the ball away. Thinks of the single momentarily but decides against it
goes for the yorker but sends down a harmless knee-length full toss that is whipped away to deep midwicket. Mosaddek keeps strike
short, wide, tries to slap it from an awkward position, was too far away from it and doesn't end up making contact
superb shot! Moves away to the off side to get inside the line of the ball before lap-scooping it . Didn't try to hit it, just makes sure to get bat to ball and the timing takes the ball all the way
very full and wide, jams it out to backward point
gets an outside edge to third man
short ball outside off, Rubel jumps up and opens the face of his bat late as the ball goes off a mild outside edge to the third man fence
full and outside off, opens the face of his bat to guide it towards third man. Enough time to grab a single but they don't take it so Mosaddek can take strike
yorker on the stumps, digs it out to mid-off
tries to bowl it full and wide, Mosaddek waits for it and gently glides it past the point fielder by opening the face of hi bat. Crowd getting behind every run now
good length, looks to back away and cut but it moves back in late and he can't put bat to ball
slams this fuller ball hard but can't beat the fielder at mid-off
shorter length and bowls it down leg, Mosaddek tries to pull but can't make contact

short ball, Mosaddek pulls and the ball goes clean over deep midwicket. There was a fielder at the boundary there but he had no chance of grabbing that. Timed that superbly and that's the 200 for Bangladesh
short again and width on offer this time. Mosaddek pounces on it and slaps it to the sweeper cover fence. Fielder dives and tries to get his hand to it but ends up pushing the ball to the rope
full and on the pads, tries to clip it to the on side but the ball goes off the leading edge to the off side

what a way for the innings to end. That was a full ball and slammed extremely hard by Mosaddek. The ball is racing away to the boundary but a brilliant save is made at the sweeper cover fence. They didn't run the first run as hard thinking it would carry to the boundary, and Mosaddek pushes Rubel to come across for the second to retain strike. The bowler collects the throw without fuss and takes the bails off at the non-striker's end and Rubel is well short of his crease

inn2.comm: loose delivery, sliding into the hips, picked away behind square on the leg side. Taskin chases the ball, slides, and then aims to swat the ball in by the edge of the rope. His back leg was in contact with the rope while doing so. The result is a four
good length and outside off, keeps low, Shahzad stoops low and punches it weakly to cover
another leg-stump ball, full in length, Mashrafe gets away with it as the flick goes only as far as backward square leg
an appeal for lbw, not given! Good length delivery, angled in and strikes the flap of the pad. Veering down leg
pitched up and angled in, Shahzad doesn't move his feet much, pushed into midwicket
Mashrafe drags his length back on off, hits the bat hard. Fended back to the bowler
skids on off from round the wicket, as the new ball often does, tapped back to him
arm-ball from Shakib, swerves in, inside-edged onto the pad
arm-ball again, ducks into Mangal. He plays around his front pad and jams an inside edge onto the pad
good length and straightens on off stump, defended
hint of width outside off, back of a length, slashed to cover point
angled into the pads, keeps low, he flicks it through square leg for a single
full and tails in on off stump, keeps low, defended back to Mashrafe
shortish and outside off, no lateral movement now, stands tall and forces the ball to cover
back of a length and cuts back in sharply from outside off. Beats the inside and pings the thigh
back of a length and closer to off, punched into the covers
back of a length on off, angled in, defended to leg on the back foot
Mashrafe pulls pace off this delivery outside off, Mangal waits on it before running it down to third man, past slip, with an angled bat
liberally flighted outside off, threads the gap at the covers with a charming drive
flatter and faster outside off, Mangal uses the pace of Shakib and angles it out to the third-man fence, after beating slip to his right. No chance for backward point as well
tossed on middle, plays down the line and defends it back

Lobbed into the hands of Taijul! Tossed up outside off, not much turn. This delivery properly stops on the batsman. Nawroz Mangal checks his drive and chips it to the right of short extra-cover. Lolly-pop catch for Taijul
full and flighted on the leg stump, Rahmat camps back and deflects it to short fine leg

What a lift for Bangladesh! Much slower through the air and drifts into the right-hander. Arm-ball raps Rahmat on the back pad in line with the stumps. Replays, though, detect an inside snick. Doesn't matter, the finger went up and Rahmat exits for a duck
back of a length and cramps Shahzad for room, punched back to the bowler
back of a length and ducks in, jammed to leg off an inside edge
back of a length and nips in, jabbed back to Mashrafe
bouncer outside off, flies off the surface to Mushfiq, who leaps with it and collects. Shahzad leapt as well for a scything upper-cut but missed. Too high. Wide
back of a length and angled in, he does not have any room to work with. Clipped from off stump to midwicket
Mashrafe gives Shahzad swinging room. He frees his arms and slaps to backward point. Mosaddek jumps, takes flight, and stops the ball smartly
Mashrafe is much closer to Shahzad now. On the off stump. Tight line, punched out to extra cover. Shahzad is getting twitchy
tossed up on off, stretches forward and defends
back of a length and outside off, skips back and punches into the covers
pushed through on the off stump, defended on the front foot to cover
length ball, turns back into the left-hander. Blocked on the back foot now
slides on outside off, Shahidi follows the ball and outside-edges it in the air to the left of first slip. A second slip would have gobbled that up
lobbed up, dips at the batsman and nearly does him in. Sweeps and drags an inside edge past the leg stump
back of a length and straightens around off, Shahidi is halfway forward as he wafts an inside edge onto the pad
full on the stumps, forward and blocked to midwicket
shortish and angling away outside off from over the stumps, pushed to cover on the back foot
back of a length incutter, cramps him for room, chopped to slip
more inward movement, draws an inside edge to the leg side
bumpy short ball, sails over Shahzad to the keeper. He aimed to swat it out of the ground, but only connected with thin air
back of a length and slanting away from the left-hander, drags a pull from outside off to mid-on
back of a length and outside off, stabbed to point
short and he nearly dragged on! He is cramped for room and early into a scything cut. The ball wanders behind
back of a length and outside off, opens the face of the bat and carves it between backward point and third man for four
short and width outside off, Shahzad unleashes a rasping square-cut, races away to the boundary
three in a row! Good length and straight in line, sweetly flicked through midwicket. No violence in that hit
full and angling across the left-hander, poked down towards mid-on off the inside edge
back of a length and angling away outside off, gets up on his tippy toes and punches to extra-cover
back of a length on off, cramps him for room, defended to cover
steps out, Mashrafe follows him and cramps him for room again. Played back towards the bowler
on the hips, short-armed away past midwicket
full on the pads, stops on the batsman, chipped in the air over backward square leg
tossed on the leg stump, MS steps away outside leg and slogs it off the inside half square through the leg side
popped in the air.... does in front of mid-on. Good length on middle, stops on the left-hander, and finds the front edge. Does not carry to the fielder
flighted and outside off, pushed to the covers on the front foot
angled across the left-hander, defended on the front foot
dragged down outside off, flat-batted down to mid-on
shoots low outside off, skids on and beats the cut
slower through the air and drifts in on middle, played back to the bowler on the front foot
flatter and fuller on off, defended
down the track and driven down to long-on
low full toss on off, driven down to long-on
MS nips down the track for a big swipe to leg. The ball dips as an inside edge is dragged past midwicket
attacking the off stump, blocked on the front foot
tossed on off, stretches forward and defends to cover
arm-ball, skids in, inside-edged to leg
sees some flight, hares down the track and lofts it powerfully over long-on for six
full and slides on on middle, forward and smothered
Three fielders converge but the skier lands safely. Down the track again, does not meet the pitch, as he aims a slog across the line. Skewed over the covers
shimmies out, Shakib shortens his length. Blocked back to the bowler
swept from the stumps to fine leg
Lusty club from Shahzad! He goes low, takes this length ball from outside off and slog-sweeps over midwicket with brute force
drifts in, turns away and snares the outside edge towards backward point
back of a length and drifts in, worked to leg
skids into the pads, dabbed to midwicket
swept from outside off to deep square leg

and he strikes with his first ball on ODI debut! Tossed up full, no turn, Shahidi plays right back to one he should have been right forward to. Beats the inside edge from round the wicket and pings him on the pad in front of middle
turning down leg, wide
turned around the corner
dabbed to square leg
offbreak, worked square on the leg side off the inside half
tossed on off, forward and across, knocked to midwicket
shortish on leg, shapes to pull. The ball takes the thigh and goes away fine
flighted and outside off, check-driven to extra-cover
full on middle, driven back
pitched up on off, straight ball, defended on the front foot
arm-ball, hangs back and bunts it back to Taijul
short and skids in, stays back and punches down to long-off
leg-stump line, directed to short fine leg

Shahzad finds Taskin at backward point. Shahzad backed away outside leg for a leg-side slog. The ball turns away from him. An outside edge flies into the hands of Taskin. Bangladesh in firm control in Mirpur. Looked highly ungainly
drifts in, turns, jumps past the outside edge. That was ripper from Shakib. Nabi was clueless
down the track, beaten in flight, hacked to mid-on
arm-ball, short, sits up to be hit. Slapped away to the right of mid-on for four
uses his feet, gets close to the pitch, and eases a single to long-off
tossed up outside off, Stanikzai runs down the track and clobbers it across the line. Puts Shakib over the wide long-on boundary. Rounds off an eventful over
looped up straight on off, dead-batted
shorter and outside off, hit down the ground
good length ball on off, hint of turn, angled in front of point
short and drifts in, powered down to long-off
flighted on off, run away to backward point
dragged down outside off, forced to long-on now
slightly short of a length ball, Nabi hangs back in the crease and punches it to long-on
good length, comes forward and defends it to the off side
defended to the off side
presses forward and defends quietly down the pitch
backs away and looks to pull but doesn't middle it and the ball goes towards the bowler
beautiful. Draws the batsman forward with a pitched up ball. Stanikzai obliges and presses forward and the ball spins sharply past the outside edge
tossed up on middle and leg, gets forward and gently pushes it to long-on
very full and on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler who dives to try and stop it
comes forward and blocks
defends it on the front foot but there is a big gap between bat and pad
tucked to square leg
tentatively pushes it to covers and thinks of a quick single. Many close-in fielders there, so no chance of a run there and is denied one rightly by the non-striker
flighted and on the stumps, backs away looking to cut but it's too full for the shot and there isn't enough bounce to pull off that shot. Beaten
tucked around the corner but square darts across and makes a diving stop
shorter ball and Nabi was shaping up for a pull. But it keeps awfully low and Nabi gets a bottom edge. Could have chopped it on
tries to push it on the front foot and the ball goes off the inside edge to long-on
defended back to the bowler off  a thin inside edge
pushed through quicker, backs away and pushes it past the bowler to long-on
runs it down to third man
gives it some air and pitches it up on the stumps, blocked on the front foot
some turn there but Stanikzai is on to neither foot, but manages to fend it off in the end
taps it to covers and thinks of a quick single but they decide against it
slower through the air this time, blocked
drags his length back, kept out off the backfoot
length ball on middle and leg, tucked behind square. They think of the second but the wicketkeeper yells at the fielder to throw the ball at his end. He does so quickly and they are kept to one
gets forward and taps this length ball to covers and calls for a single but Nabi isn't interested. Stanikzai wanted the run and isn't very pleased
floated up on the stumps, pushed right back to the bowler

gives it generous flight and Stanikzai is on to the front foot and drives it cleanly through extra cover. The fielder there puts in the dive but the ball beats him. Sweeper cover runs across but it beats him as well
defended back to the bowler
short of a length, backs away and punches off the backfoot back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, waits on the backfoot before punching it to mid-off
short of a length, holding its line outside off, fends it off to point

short and wide, slaps it airily past point who leaps in the air but can't get his hands to the ball. Third man gets around the ball and they decide to rush through for the second. The throw is awkward
looks to nudge it to the leg side but wears it on the pad instead and they take the single as the ball goes towards short leg
back of  length ball outside off, Stanikzai was shaping for a cut shot but it jags back in sharply and the batsman is beaten
short ball, doesn't middle the pull towards deep midwicket
pitched up on the stumps, pushed back on the front foot to the bowler
drifting in on the pads, tucked away for a single
tossed up outside off, whips it across the line to midwicket
looks to nudge this fuller ball and gets his front foot across but makes a late adjustment. The ball is in the air and goes on the bounce to backward square leg
works it down to long-on
tucked to short midwicket
short and wide, punched to sweeper cover off the backfoot
short and wide, moving away late, jams it straight to point
good length outside off, taps it straight to cover. Nabi darts across for a single but is firmly denied one by Stanikzai. Nabi scampers back
comes down the track and Rubel drops it short but it doesn't matter as Stanikzai responds with a cross-batted hammer through long-on
short and wide and easy pickings for Stanikzai. Waits for it and slaps it through point. Third man runs across but the ball comfortably beats him to the boundary
excellent comeback from the bowler. Pitches it up outside off and Stanikzai is on to it in a flash. But he doesn't pick the drop in pace and is through with his shot early. Beaten
drifting in to the pads, tucked around the corner on the leg side
nudged with the angle to square leg
length ball, pushed back to the right of the bowler who dives on the follow-through to get a hand to it
very full and on leg stump channel, works it down to wide long-on

huge appeal for leg before, not given. Pitches well outside off and spins back in sharply. Stanikzai gets his front foot across but is done in by the turn and is rapped on the pads. The umpire isn't interested, likely because he felt the impact was outside off. Stanikzai's front foot was a long way across
runs it down to long-on
tucked to backward square leg, needless throw fired at the non-striker's end. No one properly backing up and that allows them to steal an extra run
full and on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
tucked off the pads to deep midwicket
very full and off and middle, comes forward and pushes it to long-on
defends on the front foot and the ball goes off the inside half of the bat to midwicket
gives it a lot of flight outside off, comfortably driven down to wide long-off
pushed through quicker on the stumps, tucked away to the leg side
comes forward and turns it behind to square leg, man there
works it to the gap between square leg and midwicket
comes down the track and hits it straight to short mid-on
fligted ball and Nabi advances down the track. But the ball dips on him late and he doesn't middle the hoick. Shakib Al Hasan at mid-off misfields and lets the ball sneak past him
flatter ball, comes down the track and punches it wide of mid-off who runs across and cuts it off
flighted on off, taps it to covers and takes off for a very quick single
slightly short of a length, stays on the backfoot and punches it to the right of the bowler
hurries him by ppushing it through quicker. Nami backs away and looks to punch but jams it hard on to the boot
tucked to square leg
lngth ball, waits for it before punching it from the crease wide of mid-off
shuffles back and turns it away to the leg side
flatter and fuller outside off, taps it to covers. Nabi wants a quick single but is sent back
comes down the track and drills this away to wide long-on
gets down to sweep but wears it on the pad. Stifled appeal for lbw but the angle was taking it down the leg side. The ball runs away towards fine leg
tucked to midwicket
fires it quicker on the stumps, defended to midwicket
drops it slightly short, punches it off the backfoot to the right of the bowler who tries to cut it off but can't get low enough. The ball goes towards long-on
starts off with a full toss that is drifting in, works it with the angle with soft hands to midwicket

short ball, Stanikzai brings out the pull shot and he isn't entirely in control of that as it gets slightly big on him. The ball is in the air as it goes towards deep backward square leg but drops short of the man running in from here

another short ball, looking to unsettle the batsman with extra bounce and pace. Nabi is able to pull but again isn't in control of the shot. Gets it off a thin top edge and the ball is in the air before landing just after crossing the fielder at midwicket
switches to a fuller length, outside off, driven to cover
goes back to the short bal, it's well outside off and Stanikzai can't make connection with the pull shot
back of a length outside off, drops it in front of point. No run there
prematurely comes down the track and looks to play it to the leg side against the turn. But the ball goes off the leading edge towards point
defended to the leg side
comes down the track and nudges it past the man at midwicket. Fielder there in the deep and he gathers it by the time they start off on the second run
works it off the backfoot to mid-off
played to wide long-on
advances down the track and hammers it to long-on, cut off brilliantly at the deep by the fielder who puts in a timely dive

full and outside off and Stanikzai gets a lucky boundary. He chases and looks to drive it but the ball goes off the outside edge as he doesn't move his feet much and races away to the third man boundary
good length on off and middle, jagging back in, tucked with the angle to deep midwicket
full and outside off, driven straight to mid-off
short ball on middle and leg, ducked under
effort ball from Taskin, lets out a grunt as he pitches it up on off, worked away to mid-on
short ball, well-directed, Nabi sways out of the line of the ball
slides in on a back of a length from round the stumps, punched towards mid-off
slows this up on middle, defended
drifts in, takes the inside edge, rolls to midwicket
short on off, punched crisply past extra cover
slower through the air, Nabi, having stepped out, is beaten in flight. Jams an inside edge onto the pad
slightly short and wide outside off, cut straight to point
full on off stump, defended to cover
back of a length on off, played back to the bowler
banged in short on off, punched out to cover again
bouncer outside off, too high, sails through to Mushfiq. Stanikzai just dropped his wrists on the ball
banged in short and outside off, not as short as the previous one, upper-cuts and does not connect
middle-stump yorker to follow the short balls, squeezed out
banged in short on the off stump, chest-high, Stanikzai picked the length early. Rocking back and pasting a pull over square leg for six. That's his half-century
down the track, the ball dips, swiped through midwicket off the inside half
flatter and outside off, not all that short, cut and miss
full on the pads, swept away from the stumps to short fine ;leg
tossed up nicely, down the track, extends his arms and biffs a six over wide long-on
back of a length on off, crashed to extra cover
skidding into the thigh, shovelled on the back foot to midwicket
flighted and drifts in, inside-edged towards square leg
back of a length on off, slapped down to long-off
pushed through, stops on the batsman, check-driven to long-on
tossed on the leg stump, whipped to long-on
sees some flight on middle, charges down the track and lifts it over the bowler's head for a boundary. One-bounce four
fired into the leg stump, goes back and punches to midwicket
shortish and outside off, stands tall and forces it to extra cover
similar length but more width outside off, cracked to sweeper cover
back of a length and tails in a bit on off, punched out to midwicket on the back foot
incutter, skewed through square leg off the inside half
slower ball on off, waits and plays back towards the bowler
good length and tails in, inside-edged back to the bowler
full and outside off, Nabi hits it through the line. Slamming it over long-off for six
tight line on off, defended
short on middle, brings out an excellent pull. Swivels back, twirls his wrists, and strokes it all along the ground through backward square leg for four
back of a length, clears his front leg and carves over cover-point
back of a length and tails in on middle, pushed to midwicket

Mashrafe removes Nabi, but Afghanistan are ahead. Back of a length and swerves in after pitching outside off, strikes Nabi on the back thigh in front of off. Not sure if that would have hit off or bounced over
chopped towards point as this keeps low on off
edged between Mushfiq and slip. Full and straightens outside off from round the wicket. Najib drives away from the body and nicks it in that little gap
pitched up and outside off, played back to the bowler
length and outside off, sliced to point
full toss outside off, hit straight to mid-off
speared short on off, keeps back and punches to midwicket
short and drifts in, kept out

Oh, Stanikzai has holed out to deep midwicket! Bangladesh have hope. Runs at the bowler and takes a length ball from outside off,  heaved to the right of Sabbir. Mosaddek's night has got better. The glory shot goes wrong and drags Afghanistan back
angled in, worked to leg
straight ball on off, defended
tossed on middle, turned to square leg, caps a wicket-maiden
full and outside off, lofted straight down the ground, excellent work from the fielder. Sabbir, I think, slides and hauls the ball back into the field of play. Just three
back of a length on off, stroked to mid-on
full outside off, sliced to cover
back of a length and outside off, cracks a cut to sweeper cover
angled in, back of a length, tucked to midwicket for one
straightens outside off from round the wicket, skipping past the outside edge
tossed on off, swept to short fine leg
slower on off, nudged to midwicket
swept from the stumps through backward square leg
flatter and faster on middle, hit down to long-off
swept from outside off, straight to backward square leg
attempts a sweep again, this time strokes it to fine leg
bouncer on the leg stump/just outside leg, the umpire calls it a wide. The batsman ducked under
back of a length and stops on off stump, checks his drive and chips the ball to mid-off
down the track and heaves an inside edge to fine leg. Rashid was nowhere close to the pitch there
good length and angled in, inches forward and blocks back to the bowler
angles his bat and steers this back of a length ball from outside off to backward point
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, punchily played to cover
short and on off, shovelled down to long-on
goes straight on outside off, past the outside edge
Sarkar runs in from long-off,dives across to his right, attempts the catch with both hands, but the ball eludes him. Najib skipped out and made a mess of the lofted-drive
down the track and belted down to long-on

It's that man again: Shakib! He collects his 100th ODI wicket in Mirpur. Arm-ball, jerks into the right-hander. He is pinned to the crease and is trapped plumb in front of middle. This game is getting tighter. Strap on
tossed up and travels along a straight line outside off. He plays for the turn and is beaten
slides on middle, faster and flatter, kept out
back of a length and outside off, disdainfully slapped over extra cover for a vital boundary
veering down leg, diverted behind to Mushfiq, fine leg was inside the circle, that should have been put away
back of a length and nips in, off the inside half to midwicket
picked off the thighs to deep midwicket
full and keeps low outside off, left alone
hint of away movement outside off, ignored
dropped a bit short and outside off, moves back and cuts firmly to sweeper cover
floated outside off, forward and eased through cover
down the track and drilled to Shakib at cover
down the track, does not meet the pitch and jams an inside edge onto the pad

Mushfiq has fluffed a simple stumping. Slower through the air, Najib stepped out for a leg-side slog, but was nowhere close to the pitch. Mushfiq snatches at the ball and misses the chance, the ball bobbles out of the gloves. Big moment in the game?
skiddy delivery on off, kept out
flat and fast on middle, stays back and blocks to midwicket
shimmies out, Taijul shortens his length. Turned to midwicket
slides in on a back of a length, pushed to midwicket again
shorter and outside off, slapped to deep point. Just a single results. Sloppy running
flat and fired outside off, chopped to extra cover
down the track, does not meet the pitch, but drags the ball in an ungainly fashion to deep midwicket
speared short and outside off, cut away to sweeper cover
shuffles across, shuffles down the track. Takes it on the half-volley and blasts it over long-on for six. First boundary off Mossadek. What a key strike
pushed through shorter and quicker, swiped to long-on
full on middle and leg, whippy drive to long-on
slides on flat and just outside off, forced to extra-cover
flat-batted from outside off to the same fielder
short and wide outside off, slashes widly and misses. Went too hard at the ball and lost his shape
wide yorker, jammed only to mid-off. Another dot
Ah, Taskin goes short, the ball sails over the batsman to the keeper. Too high and wide called
Mossadek jumps and takes a good catch at backward point. Full toss on a set of stumps outside off, backed away and slapped in the air. Straight to the debutant.

Dawlat seals Afghanistan's thrilling win! They topple Bangladesh for the second time, having beaten the hosts earlier in the 2014 Asia Cup. Short of a length and outside off, Zadran swings for the hills and sends an outside edge over backward point
